Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for the transfer of service credit between certain retirement systems
Summary: Provides for the transfer of service credit by a member of the New York city police pension fund into the New York city police pension fund.
LawCode: Amd ยง446, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing for the transfer of service credit between certain retirement systems
